title: 4.3 Master Challenge 1
question: Suppose you want to use the Library to perform string manipulation in JavaScript. To concatenate two strings and remove any leading or trailing whitespace, choose a suitable library that provides string manipulation functions; define the two strings you want to concatenate and remove any leading or trailing whitespace (ensure that there is enough whitespace in the strings needed to trim); concatenate the two trimmed strings using the concatenation operator or any other string manipulation function provided by the library.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11
